Subject: The Time To Act  Is Now

Content-Length: 593

From: Yanshosh@...

::Killfest::

Killfest looks around at the bots gathered in the engine 
room. "Waiting here won't get us anywhere," he says, walking over to 
a console.

He taps a few buttons, bringing up a world map. "Megatron's base is 
located in the arctics, we need a plan to take it over."

He looks back at the others. "We need to act as soon as possible. 
With all the pods falling on the planet, he could gather himself an 
army soon. I suggest putting a few troops near his base to kill 
anyone leaving or entering. If he launches a major strike somewhere, 
we could enter his base and destroy it."
